TunableList.name: activation_rules
TunableList.description: The rules which must be satisfied for this tip to be considered as active.

TunableTuple.description: Defines groups of rules which are tested against to see if this rule set should be considered activated.

TunableEnum.name: children_condition
TunableEnum.description: The conditional logic applied to the criteria in this rule group. AND means all of the rules in this group need to return 'true' for the group to be considered complete. OR means any of the rules in this group can return 'true' for the group value to be considered true.

TunableList.name: criteria
TunableList.description: The criterion items to be matched.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: A rule which can be tested against.

TunableEnum.name: boolean
TunableEnum.description: Always or never

TunableEnum.name: build_buy_object_tag
TunableEnum.description: An object tag. If one or more objects are placed on the zone lot during the last build/buy session, this criterion will be satisfied.

TunableEnum.name: cas_edit_mode
TunableEnum.description: The cas edit mode the client must be in for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: feature_parameter
Tunable.description: Checks the feature parameter value is present for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: first_time_player
Tunable.description: The player must be a first time player for this criterion to be valid.

TunableTuple.name: game_option_setting
TunableTuple.description: Checks named game option to see if the named setting's current value is the given number.

Tunable.name: setting_name
Tunable.description: The name of the game option setting to test.

Tunable.name: setting_value
Tunable.description: The expected value the game option should be for the test to succeed.

TunableEnum.name: game_state
TunableEnum.description: The game state the client must be in for this criterion to be valid.

TunableEnum.name: guidance_mode
TunableEnum.description: The guidance mode on which this criterion is valid STANDARD allows this tip to be in the original / standard guidance mode. DISABLED means this criterion is valid in any mode.

TunableList.name: guidance_tip_group_satisfied
TunableList.description: The Tip Groups that must be complete for this criterion to be valid.

TunableList.name: guidance_tips_satisfied
TunableList.description: A list of guidance tips that must be satisfied in order for this criteron to activate. If any tip in this list is not satisfied, this criterion will not activate.

TunableEnum.name: platform_filter
TunableEnum.description: The platforms on which this criterion is valid

TunableList.name: ui_element_visible
TunableList.description: The UI elements that are required to be visible in order for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: When set will NOT the result of the criterion.

TunableEnum.name: parent_condition
TunableEnum.description: The conditional logic applied to the group when comparing against other rule groups in this set.

Tunable.name: auto_select_on_activate
Tunable.description: If enabled, the guidance item will not display any UI and will automatically select and run the actions on the first option as soon as it activates.

Tunable.name: guidance_group_to_unsatisfy_on_relaunch
Tunable.display: Guidance Group To Unsatisfy On Relaunch
Tunable.description: The guidance item group which will ne unsatisfied when this item is relaunched

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon to be displayed on the guidance item UI.

TunableList.name: options
TunableList.description: The question options displayed in the UI for this tip

TunableTuple.name: actions
TunableTuple.description: The actions and satisfaction rules for when this option is selected.

TunableList.name: actions_on_activate
TunableList.description: The Actions which will be performed when this option is activated.

Tunable.name: activate_guidance_item
Tunable.description: Guidance Item to activate after this action is executed.

Tunable.name: satisfy_guidance_item_group
Tunable.description: Guidance item group to satisfy when this this action is executed.

Tunable.name: satisfy_item
Tunable.description: Guidance item to satisfy when this this action is executed.

Tunable.name: tutorial_tip_group
Tunable.description: Tutorial tip group to show when this this action is executed.

TunableTuple.name: ui_message
TunableTuple.description: Sends a message to the UI when this action is executed.

TunableVariant.name: ui_message_cmn
TunableVariant.description: Sends a message to the UI for a guidance tip.

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Represents a message to be sent to the UI.

Tunable.name: message_name
Tunable.description: Name of the UI message. e.g. 'ShowEscapeMenu'

TunableList.name: parameters
TunableList.description: Any parameters to send with the message. Consult your UI engineering partner to determine what parameters, if any, should be specified.

TunableVariant.name: value
TunableVariant.description: Value to associate with this parameter.

Tunable.name: raw_bool
Tunable.description: Provide a boolean value.

Tunable.name: raw_float
Tunable.description: Provide a floating-point value.

Tunable.name: raw_int
Tunable.description: Provide an integer value.

Tunable.name: raw_string
Tunable.description: Provide a non-localized string.

Tunable.name: resource_key
Tunable.description: Provide a resource key. This is provided to the UI in the same format as the ResourceKey AS3 class.

TunableVariant.name: ui_message_ps4
TunableVariant.description: If set, overrides the ui_message_cmn to be specific to the PS4 platform

TunableTuple.name: enabled
TunableTuple.description: Represents a message to be sent to the UI.

Tunable.name: message_name
Tunable.description: Name of the UI message. e.g. 'ShowEscapeMenu'

TunableList.name: parameters
TunableList.description: Any parameters to send with the message. Consult your UI engineering partner to determine what parameters, if any, should be specified.

TunableVariant.name: value
TunableVariant.description: Value to associate with this parameter.

Tunable.name: raw_bool
Tunable.description: Provide a boolean value.

Tunable.name: raw_float
Tunable.description: Provide a floating-point value.

Tunable.name: raw_int
Tunable.description: Provide an integer value.

Tunable.name: raw_string
Tunable.description: Provide a non-localized string.

Tunable.name: resource_key
Tunable.description: Provide a resource key. This is provided to the UI in the same format as the ResourceKey AS3 class.

TunableVariant.name: ui_message_xb1
TunableVariant.description: If set, overrides the ui_message_cmn to be specific to the XB1 platform

Tunable.name: unsatisfy_guidance_item_group
Tunable.description: Guidance item group to unsatisfy when this this action is executed.

Tunable.name: unsatisfy_item
Tunable.description: Guidance item to unsatisfy when this this action is executed.

TunableList.name: actions_on_cancel
TunableList.description: The Actions which will be performed when a cancel is received by the running activate actions.

Tunable.name: activate_guidance_item
Tunable.description: Guidance Item to activate after this action is executed.

Tunable.name: satisfy_guidance_item_group
Tunable.description: Guidance item group to satisfy when this this action is executed.

Tunable.name: satisfy_item
Tunable.description: Guidance item to satisfy when this this action is executed.

Tunable.description: Tutorial tip group to show when this this action is executed.

Tunable.name: unsatisfy_guidance_item_group
Tunable.description: Guidance item group to unsatisfy when this this action is executed.

Tunable.name: unsatisfy_item
Tunable.description: Guidance item to unsatisfy when this this action is executed.

Tunable.name: satisfy_on_action_cancel
Tunable.description: If enabled, the guidance item is satisfied when a cancel is received by the actions.

Tunable.name: satisfy_on_action_success
Tunable.description: If enabled, the guidance item is satisfied when a success is received by the actions.

Tunable.name: satisfy_on_activate
Tunable.description: If enabled, the guidance item is satisfied when the actions are run.

TunableList.name: display_rules
TunableList.description: The rules which must be satisfied for this option to be shown or disabled, or empty for always show.

TunableTuple.description: Defines groups of rules which are tested against to see if this rule set should be considered activated.

TunableEnum.name: children_condition
TunableEnum.description: The conditional logic applied to the criteria in this rule group. AND means all of the rules in this group need to return 'true' for the group to be considered complete. OR means any of the rules in this group can return 'true' for the group value to be considered true.

TunableList.name: criteria
TunableList.description: The criterion items to be matched.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: A rule which can be tested against.

TunableEnum.name: boolean
TunableEnum.description: Always or never

TunableEnum.name: build_buy_object_tag
TunableEnum.description: An object tag. If one or more objects are placed on the zone lot during the last build/buy session, this criterion will be satisfied.

TunableEnum.name: cas_edit_mode
TunableEnum.description: The cas edit mode the client must be in for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: feature_parameter
Tunable.description: Checks the feature parameter value is present for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: first_time_player
Tunable.description: The player must be a first time player for this criterion to be valid.

TunableTuple.name: game_option_setting
TunableTuple.description: Checks named game option to see if the named setting's current value is the given number.

Tunable.name: setting_name
Tunable.description: The name of the game option setting to test.

Tunable.name: setting_value
Tunable.description: The expected value the game option should be for the test to succeed.

TunableEnum.name: game_state
TunableEnum.description: The game state the client must be in for this criterion to be valid.

TunableEnum.name: guidance_mode
TunableEnum.description: The guidance mode on which this criterion is valid STANDARD allows this tip to be in the original / standard guidance mode. DISABLED means this criterion is valid in any mode.

TunableList.name: guidance_tip_group_satisfied
TunableList.description: The Tip Groups that must be complete for this criterion to be valid.

TunableList.name: guidance_tips_satisfied
TunableList.description: A list of guidance tips that must be satisfied in order for this criteron to activate. If any tip in this list is not satisfied, this criterion will not activate.

TunableEnum.name: platform_filter
TunableEnum.description: The platforms on which this criterion is valid

TunableList.name: ui_element_visible
TunableList.description: The UI elements that are required to be visible in order for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: When set will NOT the result of the criterion.

TunableEnum.name: parent_condition
TunableEnum.description: The conditional logic applied to the group when comparing against other rule groups in this set.

Tunable.name: display_rules_disable_option
Tunable.description: When enabled, if the display rules fail the option will be shown in the UI but will be disabled with a tooltip.

TunableEnum.name: display_type
TunableEnum.description: The option layout display type.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: The icon to be displayed for this option if the display type allows icons.

Tunable.name: suppress_hide_on_activate
Tunable.description: If enabled, the ui will not be hidden when the action is activated.

Tunable.name: text
Tunable.description: The text to display for this option.

Tunable.name: tooltip
Tunable.description: The tooltip to display for this option button.

Tunable.name: priority
Tunable.description: The order the items are shown when multiple items could activate at the same time. Higher values will be selected first. Items with equal values will be selected in an undefined order.

TunableEnum.name: relaunch_item_category
TunableEnum.description: This allows the UI to group items in the relaunch menu into a submenu using this label as the button name. Categories are displayed at the end of the normal list, and the order of the categories is based on the item with the highest sort order in the category.

Tunable.name: relaunch_item_sort_order
Tunable.description: The order the items are shown in the relaunch menu. Higher values will be first. Items with equal values will be displayed in an undefined order.

TunableList.name: relaunch_rules
TunableList.description: The rules which must be satisfied for this tip to be allowed to be relaunched.

TunableTuple.description: Defines groups of rules which are tested against to see if this rule set should be considered activated.

TunableEnum.name: children_condition
TunableEnum.description: The conditional logic applied to the criteria in this rule group. AND means all of the rules in this group need to return 'true' for the group to be considered complete. OR means any of the rules in this group can return 'true' for the group value to be considered true.

TunableList.name: criteria
TunableList.description: The criterion items to be matched.

TunableVariant.name: criterion
TunableVariant.description: A rule which can be tested against.

TunableEnum.name: boolean
TunableEnum.description: Always or never

TunableEnum.name: build_buy_object_tag
TunableEnum.description: An object tag. If one or more objects are placed on the zone lot during the last build/buy session, this criterion will be satisfied.

TunableEnum.name: cas_edit_mode
TunableEnum.description: The cas edit mode the client must be in for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: feature_parameter
Tunable.description: Checks the feature parameter value is present for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: first_time_player
Tunable.description: The player must be a first time player for this criterion to be valid.

TunableTuple.name: game_option_setting
TunableTuple.description: Checks named game option to see if the named setting's current value is the given number.

Tunable.name: setting_name
Tunable.description: The name of the game option setting to test.

Tunable.name: setting_value
Tunable.description: The expected value the game option should be for the test to succeed.

TunableEnum.name: game_state
TunableEnum.description: The game state the client must be in for this criterion to be valid.

TunableEnum.name: guidance_mode
TunableEnum.description: The guidance mode on which this criterion is valid STANDARD allows this tip to be in the original / standard guidance mode. DISABLED means this criterion is valid in any mode.

TunableList.name: guidance_tip_group_satisfied
TunableList.description: The Tip Groups that must be complete for this criterion to be valid.

TunableList.name: guidance_tips_satisfied
TunableList.description: A list of guidance tips that must be satisfied in order for this criteron to activate. If any tip in this list is not satisfied, this criterion will not activate.

TunableEnum.name: platform_filter
TunableEnum.description: The platforms on which this criterion is valid

TunableList.name: ui_element_visible
TunableList.description: The UI elements that are required to be visible in order for this criterion to be valid.

Tunable.name: exclude_if_matched
Tunable.description: When set will NOT the result of the criterion.

TunableEnum.name: parent_condition
TunableEnum.description: The conditional logic applied to the group when comparing against other rule groups in this set.

Tunable.name: relaunch_text
Tunable.description: The text to display for this item in the relaunch menu

Tunable.name: satisfy_on_timeout
Tunable.description: If enabled, the guidance item is satisfied when the timeout occurs.

Tunable.name: text
Tunable.description: The text to be displayed in the guidance item UI.

Tunable.name: timeout
Tunable.description: How long, in seconds, until this tip times out, or 0 for no timeout.

Tunable.name: title
Tunable.description: The title to be displayed in the guidance item UI.
